name: Dataset for the paper "Predictive Coding of Reward in the Hippocampus"
citation: Yaghoubi, Mohammad (2025) Dataset for the paper "Predictive Coding of Reward in the Hippocampus" (Version draft) [Data set]. DANDI Archive. https://dandiarchive.org/dandiset/001631/draft
description: The dataset includes all data used in the paper “Predictive Coding of Reward in the Hippocampus.” It comprises recordings from 7 mice across a total of 181 sessions. Each session contains neuronal, behavioural, and task-related data.
